comments:
I installed the clover plug-in with eclipse 3.1M5a on Windows 2k3. I get build
error message on a rebuild, but nothing in the problems view. I found the
following exceptions in the  .log file:

Launch.getLaunchConfiguration() can return null. Should be checking for that case.
Fixed in ProcessConsole
